page.title: 15BILLERICAY NW Recreation
page.content: In{Lake Meadows}there are many attractions for leisure activities. A sloping area is utilised as a 9_hole golf course and a small 'crazy golf' area has been constructed near a well_maintained bowling green. The local hockey pitch is also situated close by. The lake itself is an attraction to fishermen, and an enclosed area is set aside for paddle boats. Tennis courts cater for the more energetic. There is an area put aside for children where swings, slides, roundabout and climbing frames have been erected. Overlooking this play area is a{cafeteria,}first aid post and{toilets.} The whole area is tastefully landscaped with shrubs,lawns and gardens. Numerous wild fowl inhabit the islands in the lake.
